customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
As a seasoned sailor, Lectoure has seen many nations and heard sundry tales from far and wide. Among them, he was most impressed by stories of the deeds of a brace and battle-wise general. Some day, he hopes that he too can become that well-rounded, able to both navigate at sea and fight on land...
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Gorou
customize.desc:
"Canine Warrior" Gorou

The leader of the pack, leading the soldiers onward!

customize.name: Eremite Scorching Loremaster
customize.desc:
"Poetry and Secret Histories" Eremite Scorching Loremaster

Those who still remember will never betray the spirit of the sands yet flowing through their veins.

customize.name: Arataki Itto
customize.desc:
"Hanamizaka Heroics" Arataki Itto

Arataki "The Ultimate TCG Champion" Itto

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...
